q: Eric Schmidt will step down as the CEO of Google in April, the company announced today via official blog post. Mr. Eric Schmidt will remain executive chairman and serve as adviser to Mr. Page and Sergey Brin , the other company co-founder and its president of technology, reports the New York Times.
